phlogiston.disassembler.disassembler

Disassembler for convert Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) bytecode to EVM assembly language.

class Disassembler;
Converts a stream of bytes into EVM assembly code.

string[] disassemble(string vmBytes);
This routine converts the given EVM bytecode into a string containing EVM assembly language code.

Params:
string vmBytes The string containing EVM bytecode.

Returns:
An array EVM assembly language code opcodes.
